title: üß™ Test Signup Flow Guide
description: Test guide for the GuideFloat test page - demonstrates all features
affiliateDisclosure: This is a test guide for development purposes.

prerequisites.title: What You'll Need
prerequisites.description: Make sure you have these ready before starting:

checkpoints.question: Do you have the test page open?

steps.title: Create Account - Email & Password
steps.description: Start by entering your email and password to create an account
steps.instructions:
1. Enter your email address in the email field
2. Create a secure password (8+ characters)
3. Confirm your password
4. Check the terms and conditions box
5. Click 'Create Account' to continue

üí° Pro Tip: Use a real email format like test@example.com
üìù Note: This is a test page - no real account will be created
steps.layoutDiagram: <svg viewBox='0 0 300 120' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'><rect width='300' height='120' fill='#eff6ff' rx='8'/><text x='150' y='20' text-anchor='middle' font-size='13' font-weight='600' fill='#1e40af'>üîç Step 1: Account Creation</text><rect x='20' y='30' width='260' height='20' fill='#f3f4f6' stroke='#9ca3af' stroke-width='1' rx='4'/><text x='150' y='44' text-anchor='middle' font-size='11' fill='#374151'>Email Input</text><rect x='20' y='55' width='260' height='20' fill='#f3f4f6' stroke='#9ca3af' stroke-width='1' rx='4'/><text x='150' y='69' text-anchor='middle' font-size='11' fill='#374151'>Password Input</text><rect x='20' y='80' width='260' height='25' fill='#667eea' rx='4'/><text x='150' y='97' text-anchor='middle' font-size='12' font-weight='bold' fill='white'>Create Account Button</text></svg>
tips: This is a test page - no real data is saved
Use any email format for testing
Password can be anything for testing purposes
Watch the blue dot guide you to each field

spotlight.message: Let's start by creating your account - I'll guide you through each field

autoNavigate.message: Opening the test page for you...

fields.message: Check the terms and conditions box

steps.title: Complete Your Profile
steps.description: Fill in your personal information to complete your profile
steps.instructions:
1. Enter your first name
2. Enter your last name
3. Optionally add your company name
4. Select your industry from the dropdown
5. Add your phone number (optional)
6. Click 'Continue' to proceed

üí° Pro Tip: All fields except company and phone are required
üìù Note: This information helps customize your experience
steps.layoutDiagram: <svg viewBox='0 0 300 140' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'><rect width='300' height='140' fill='#eff6ff' rx='8'/><text x='150' y='20' text-anchor='middle' font-size='13' font-weight='600' fill='#1e40af'>üîç Step 2: Profile Information</text><rect x='20' y='30' width='120' height='20' fill='#f3f4f6' stroke='#9ca3af' stroke-width='1' rx='4'/><text x='80' y='44' text-anchor='middle' font-size='10' fill='#374151'>First Name</text><rect x='160' y='30' width='120' height='20' fill='#f3f4f6' stroke='#9ca3af' stroke-width='1' rx='4'/><text x='220' y='44' text-anchor='middle' font-size='10' fill='#374151'>Last Name</text><rect x='20' y='60' width='260' height='20' fill='#f3f4f6' stroke='#9ca3af' stroke-width='1' rx='4'/><text x='150' y='74' text-anchor='middle' font-size='11' fill='#374151'>Company (Optional)</text><rect x='20' y='90' width='260' height='20' fill='#f3f4f6' stroke='#9ca3af' stroke-width='1' rx='4'/><text x='150' y='104' text-anchor='middle' font-size='11' fill='#374151'>Industry Dropdown</text><rect x='20' y='115' width='260' height='20' fill='#667eea' rx='4'/><text x='150' y='129' text-anchor='middle' font-size='12' font-weight='bold' fill='white'>Continue Button</text></svg>
tips: First and last name are required
Phone number is optional but recommended

spotlight.message: Enter your first and last name to complete your profile

fields.message: Select your industry from the dropdown

steps.title: Set Your Preferences
steps.description: Customize your experience by setting your preferences
steps.instructions:
1. Select the features you're most interested in (checkboxes)
2. Choose your email notification frequency
3. Optionally subscribe to the newsletter
4. Click 'Complete Setup' to finish

üí° Pro Tip: You can select multiple features that interest you
üìù Note: These preferences can be changed later in your account settings
steps.layoutDiagram: <svg viewBox='0 0 300 120' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'><rect width='300' height='120' fill='#eff6ff' rx='8'/><text x='150' y='20' text-anchor='middle' font-size='13' font-weight='600' fill='#1e40af'>üîç Step 3: Preferences</text><rect x='20' y='30' width='20' height='20' fill='#f3f4f6' stroke='#9ca3af' stroke-width='1' rx='2'/><text x='30' y='44' font-size='10' fill='#374151'>‚òëÔ∏è</text><text x='50' y='44' font-size='10' fill='#374151'>Feature Checkboxes</text><rect x='20' y='55' width='260' height='20' fill='#f3f4f6' stroke='#9ca3af' stroke-width='1' rx='4'/><text x='150' y='69' text-anchor='middle' font-size='11' fill='#374151'>Notification Frequency</text><rect x='20' y='80' width='20' height='20' fill='#f3f4f6' stroke='#9ca3af' stroke-width='1' rx='2'/><text x='30' y='94' font-size='10' fill='#374151'>‚òê</text><text x='50' y='94' font-size='10' fill='#374151'>Newsletter Subscription</text><rect x='20' y='105' width='260' height='20' fill='#10b981' rx='4'/><text x='150' y='119' text-anchor='middle' font-size='12' font-weight='bold' fill='white'>Complete Setup</text></svg>
tips: Choose notification frequency that works for you
All preferences can be changed later

spotlight.message: Select your preferences and notification settings

fields.message: Select the features you're interested in

steps.title: üéâ Setup Complete!
steps.description: Congratulations! You've successfully completed the test signup flow
steps.instructions:
1. Review the success message
2. Click 'Go to Dashboard' to complete the flow
3. You've successfully tested all GuideFloat features!

üéâ Congratulations! You've completed the test guide and seen how GuideFloat works with:
‚Ä¢ Auto-navigation to the test page
‚Ä¢ Blue dot spotlight guidance
‚Ä¢ Field-by-field progression
‚Ä¢ Auto-advancement between steps
‚Ä¢ Visual diagrams and helpful tips
